div.p: We thank Rhian Rowson at the Bristol Museum and Art Gallery, Holly Morgenroth at the Royal Albert Memorial Museum & Art Gallery Exeter Ark and James Hogan at the Oxford University Museum of Natural History for allowing access to their museumâ€™s peppered moth collections for photography. We also thank Jolyon Troscianko for providing assistance with printer calibration, Molly Rogers for assisting with museum specimen photography, and Emmanuelle Briolat for advice. The work was supported by a BBSRC grant (BB/L017709/1) to MS.
